title: 08/20/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 08/20/21 DPS Best Of
description:
Jason Smith and Rob Parker, in for Dan, react to Thursday night's NFL preseason action and debate who the New England Patriots will start the season with at quarterback. The guys react to LeBron James taking offense to receiving no votes in a player's poll for best player in the league. Jason and Rob compare and contrast LeBron's career to Tom Brady's and debate what defines success in sports. Albert Breer of Monday Morning Quarterback joins the guys to explain why Bill O'Brien may be primed to secede Bill Belichick, plus the latest news from training camps around the league!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
